main_heading: Transform every customer into your best promoter
hero_description: FideliPromo merges intelligent cashback with multilevel referrals. More than loyalty: an ecosystem of organic growth for your business in Resistencia.
intelligent_cashback_desc: Every purchase generates a percentage back that accumulates as a balance for the next consumption in your business.
multilevel_referrals_desc: Your customers become ambassadors. Up to 3 levels of commissions for referring new buyers.
no_apps_to_download_desc: Progressive Web App (PWA) that works from any browser and can be installed as a native app.
your_strategic_ally: Your strategic ally in loyalty and growth
